column4: Im new to linux but looking to swtich, I cannot figure out how to actually "connect" to the internet ive already went through with pppconfig and done everything, anyone mind helping me out?
what kind of modem card do you have?
sorry for the wait, I had to refamiliarize myself with pppconfig (I lived there for years, but as I get older, I find I need to check myself)
did pppconfig find your modem automagically?
